channel.title: CVE Feed for Puppet -- Puppet server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Puppet -- Puppet server

item.title: CVE-2017-2295|2024-08-05T13:48:05.197Z -- puppet -- puppet%20server
item.description: Versions of Puppet prior to 4.10.1 will deserialize data off the wire (from the agent to the server, in this case) with a attacker-specified format. This could be used to force YAML deserialization in an unsafe manner, which would lead to remote code execution. This change constrains the format of data on the wire to PSON or safely decoded YAML.
